snippet: Evidence put forth by the United States Anti-Doping Agency drew a picture of Lance Armstrong as an infamous cheat, a defiant liar and a bully who pushed others to cheat with him.
abstract: United States Anti-Doping Agency unveils hundreds of pages of eyewitness testimony portraying Lance Armstrong as an infamous cheat and liar who led one of the most sophisticated sports doping programs in history; evidence reveals that Armstrong persistently used threats and intimidation to bully his teammates into doping themselves.
lead_paragraph: Evidence put forth by the United States Anti-Doping Agency drew a picture of Lance Armstrong as an infamous cheat, a defiant liar and a bully who pushed others to cheat with him.

headline.seo: Antidoping Agency Details Doping Case Against Lance Armstrong
headline.main: Details of Doping Scheme Paint Armstrong as Leader
headline.print_headline: Details of Doping Scheme Paint Armstrong as Leader
